title: Common Grounds
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Indian, International, Take-out, Sri Lankan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers a number of veg options and very accommodating for vegans. Options can include Indian/Sri Lankan veg curries, Indian wraps, jambalaya and the yum bowl. Soya milk is also available for coffees/lattes and soy steamers. Cafe is not-for-profit and donates large amounts to charities.
